titleStmt.title: Sanskrit Manuscripts in the Bodleian Libraries

msDesc.head: A composite manuscript containing twelve manuscript works on kāvya, bound together upon their arrival in the Bodleian Library.

binding.p: Early 20th-century brown textile binding over pasteboard, with shelfmark and description tooled in gold on the spine. Cardboard cover box.

history.acquisition: Donated by Shum Shere, Chandra Mahārāja Chandra Shamsher Jang Bahadur Rana in 1909.

msContents.summary: A paper manuscript of the Kavirahasya in 272 verses, composed by Halāyudha.

msItem.title: Kavirahasya
msItem.rubric: F. 3v [f. 1v in original foliation]: śrīgaṇeṣāya namaḥ || śrī pāṇinīkātyāyanapataṃjalibhyo namaḥ |
msItem.incipit: F. 3v [f. 1v in original foliation]: jayaṃti murajitpādanakhadīdhitidīpikā | mohāṃdhakāravidhvaṃsānmuktimārgaṃpradarkṣikāḥ |
msItem.colophon: F. 16r [f. 14r in original foliation]: iti samāptam avāpta guṇodayaṃ kavirahasyam idaṃ rasikapriyaṃ || sadamidhānanidhānahalāyudhadijavarasyaṣṭutiḥ sukṛtātmanaḥ 273

supportDesc.foliation: Devanāgarī numerals, top-left and bottom-right margin, verso
Arabic numerals in pencil, bottom-right corner, recto (added by Gambier-Parry, Thomas Thomas Gambier-Parry); this foliation starts with the first flyleaf).

handNote.desc: Devanāgarī in black ink. Several folios highlighted in red powder and ruled in red ink.

additions.p: Abbreviated marginal title, top left margin, verso.

availability.p: Entry to read in the Library is permitted only on presentation of a valid reader's card, for admissions procedures contact Bodleian Libraries' Admissions Office.

analytic.title: A Handlist of the Vyākaraṇa Manuscripts in the Chandra Shum Shere Collection Preserved in the Bodleian Library.

msContents.summary: A paper manuscript of the Kavirahasya, composed by Halāyudha.

msItem.title: Kavirahasya
msItem.rubric: F. 18r [f. 1r in original foliation]: śrīrāmacaṃdraya namaḥ
msItem.incipit: F. 18r [f. 1r in original foliation]: jayaṃti murajitpādanakhadīdhitidīpikāḥ | mohāṃdhakāravidhvaṃsānpnohaktimārgaprakāśikāḥ |
msItem.colophon: F. 32r [f. 15r in original foliation]: iti samāptim avāpaguṇodayaṃ kavirahasyam idaṁ rasikapriyam sadabhidhānanidhānahalāyudhadvijavarasya kṛtis tu kṛtātmanaḥ 73 iti śrī kavirahasyaṁ samāptiḥ 1

supportDesc.foliation: Devanāgarī numerals, top-leftmargin, verso. Occassionally erroneous.
Arabic numerals in pencil, bottom-right corner, recto (added by Gambier-Parry, Thomas Thomas Gambier-Parry); this foliation starts with the first flyleaf).

condition.p: In good condition. F. 31 is water damaged, with loss of some akṣaras.

additions.p: Abbreviated marginal title, top left margin, verso.

availability.p: Entry to read in the Library is permitted only on presentation of a valid reader's card, for admissions procedures contact Bodleian Libraries' Admissions Office.

analytic.title: A Handlist of the Vyākaraṇa Manuscripts in the Chandra Shum Shere Collection Preserved in the Bodleian Library.

msContents.summary: A previously undescribed paper manuscript of the Bhāminīvilāsa, composed by Jagannātha Paṇḍitarāja.

msItem.title: Bhāminīvilāsa
msItem.rubric: F. 34r [f. 1r in original foliation]: śrī gaṇeśāya namaḥ ||
msItem.colophon: F. 43r [f. 10r in original foliation]: iti śrīmaj jagannāthapaṃḍitta vircitebhāminīvilāseśāṃtaścaturthovilāsaḥ samāptaḥ || saṃvat 1900 pauṣakṛ[?]ma 9 bhṛguvāsare tad dine idaṃ pustakaṁ samāptoyāṁ || śrī kāśīviśveśvarā namaḥ śrī annapūrṇādevyai namaḥ || cha || cha

supportDesc.foliation: Devanāgarī numerals, top-left and bottom-right margin, verso.
Arabic numerals in pencil, bottom-right corner, recto (added by Gambier-Parry, Thomas Thomas Gambier-Parry); this foliation starts with the first flyleaf).

additions.p: Abbreviated marginal title, top left margin, verso.

availability.p: Entry to read in the Library is permitted only on presentation of a valid reader's card, for admissions procedures contact Bodleian Libraries' Admissions Office.

msContents.summary: A previously unpublished paper manuscript of Rākṣasakāvya, sometimes attributed to Kālidāsa, with vyākhyāna by Bālambhaṭṭa Pāyaguṇḍa.

msItem.title: Vyākhyāna
msItem.colophon: F. 51v [f. 7v in original foliation]: iti pāyaṃgujopārayyavā lakṛ[??]dhiracitaṃ rākṣasakāvyavyāradhyānaṁ samāptaṁ saṃ° 1837 codhinpāṃ

supportDesc.foliation: Devanāgarī numerals, bottom-right margin, verso.
Arabic numerals in pencil, bottom-right corner, recto (added by Gambier-Parry, Thomas Thomas Gambier-Parry); this foliation starts with the first flyleaf).

condition.p: A hole on bottom-left (recto) / top-left (verso) corner of all folios.

availability.p: Entry to read in the Library is permitted only on presentation of a valid reader's card, for admissions procedures contact Bodleian Libraries' Admissions Office.

msContents.summary: A previously undescribed manuscript of two incomplete portions of Sītārāmavihāra by Lakṣmaṇa Somayājin. Incomplete, in two portions, each written in a different hand.

msItem.title: Sītārāmavihāra
msItem.rubric: F. 53v [f. 1v in original foliation]: śrī gaṇeśāya namaḥ ||
msItem.incipit: F. 53v [f. 1v in original foliation]: asti praśasti khila loka bhuṣābi bhuṣita dvadaśayotanaiṣ [loss of text][...]

msItem.title: Sītārāmavihāra
msItem.rubric: F. 90r [f. 82r in original foliation]: śrī gaṇeśāya namaḥ ||
msItem.incipit: F. 90r [f. 82r in original foliation]: tatas tu tattainpanivāsinīnāṁ vilāsinīnāṁ saha nālasānāṁ |

supportDesc.foliation: Devanāgarī numerals, top-left and bottom-right margin, verso.
Arabic numerals in pencil, bottom-right corner, recto (added by Gambier-Parry, Thomas Thomas Gambier-Parry); this foliation starts with the first flyleaf).

condition.p: Many folios have damaged margins and considerable damage by worms.
Incomplete. In the first item, ff. 2, 20, 22, and 29 [original foliation] are missing. The original foliation runs until f. 27, which is followed by f. 25 again and continues to f. 28.
In the second item, there is a large correction in yellow pigment on f. 99r, resulting in the loss of some akṣaras.

handNote.desc: Devanāgarī in black ink. In the second part, daṇḍas written in red. Highlighted in red powder.

additions.p: Abbreviated marginal title, top left margin, verso.

availability.p: Entry to read in the Library is permitted only on presentation of a valid reader's card, for admissions procedures contact Bodleian Libraries' Admissions Office.

msContents.summary: A previously undescribed incomplete paper manuscript of the Śabdaratnamālikā.

msItem.title: Śabdaratnamālikā
msItem.rubric: f. 101r || atha kāvyopayogini śabd[ra]atna || || mālikā likhyate || śubhaṃ bhavatu ||

supportDesc.foliation: Devanāgarī numerals, mid-left and mid-right margin, verso. Not extant on all folios.
Arabic numerals in pencil, bottom-right corner, recto (added by Gambier-Parry, Thomas Thomas Gambier-Parry); this foliation starts with the first flyleaf).

condition.p: Frail margins on a few folios.

availability.p: Entry to read in the Library is permitted only on presentation of a valid reader's card, for admissions procedures contact Bodleian Libraries' Admissions Office.

msContents.summary: A previously uncatalogued paper manuscript of Rādhāvinodakāvya of Rāmacandra Kavi, including the Rādhāvinodakāvyaṭīkā.

msItem.title: Rādhāvinodakāvya
msItem.incipit: F. 109r [f. 1r in original foliation]: mālīnovanamālīmālīnovanālī mālīnovanamālīmālīnovatumālī 1

msItem.title: Rādhāvinodakāvyaṭīkā
msItem.rubric: F. 109r [f. 1r in original foliation]: śrī rādhākṛsmāya namaḥ ||
msItem.incipit: F. 109r [f. 1r in original foliation]: pitavacanam avaśyam eva pālyaṃ jagatī janānī tīśāsituṃ vanāṃ taṃ gatimatikaruṇā sārducintaṃ radhupatim ekam upāsmhosadāraṃ 1
msItem.colophon: F. 118r [f. 10r in original foliation]: iti śrī rāmacaṃdrakaviracitaṃ rādhāvinodākhyaṃkāvyaṁ tasyeyaṁ ṭīkā samāptā || 1 ||

layout.note: Commentary layout: tripāṭha; mūla cited in full.

availability.p: Entry to read in the Library is permitted only on presentation of a valid reader's card, for admissions procedures contact Bodleian Libraries' Admissions Office.

msContents.summary: A previously uncatalogued paper manuscript of Rādhāvinodakāvya of Rāmacandra Kavi, including the Rādhāvinodakāvyaṭīkā.

msItem.title: Rādhāvinodakāvya
msItem.incipit: F. 120v [f. 1v in original foliation]: mālīnovanamālīmālīno 'vanamālī || mālīnovanamālīmālīnovatumālī || 1 ||

msItem.title: Rādhāvinodakāvyaṭīkā
msItem.rubric: F. 120v [f. 1v in original foliation]: śrī gaṇeśāya namaḥ ||
msItem.incipit: F. 120v [f. 1v in original foliation]: piṭuvacanam avaśyam eva pālyaṃ jagati janānī tīśāsituṃ vanāṃ te || gatimatikaraṇā rasār ducintaṃ radhupatim ekam upāsmahesadāraṃ || 1 ||
msItem.colophon: F. 128v [f. 9v in original foliation]: iti śrī rāmacaṃdrakavikṛtaṃ rādhāvinodakāvyaṁ savyāravyātaṃ samāsaṃ ||

supportDesc.support:
Paper. F. 127 [f. 8 in original foliation] written on heavier, yellow paper.,
12 26

Arabic numerals in pencil, bottom-right corner, recto (added by Gambier-Parry, Thomas Thomas Gambier-Parry); this foliation starts with the first flyleaf).

msContents.summary: A previously uncatalogued paper manuscript of the Rāmavilāsa of Viśvanātha Rānaḍa, with notes and glosses.

msItem.title: Rāmavilāsa
msItem.rubric: F. 130v [f. 1v in original foliation]: śrī gaṇeśāya namaḥ ||
msItem.incipit: F. 130v [f. 1v in original foliation]: yacchiṣpair acitā jayaṃti jagati graṃthā hite
msItem.colophon: F. 130v [f. 1v in original foliation]: || || śrī bhavānī śaṃkarābhyāṃ namaḥ || || samāptaṃ rāmavilāsakāvyaṃ || || śubham astu || || cha || || ||
msItem.note: The colophon is written in a different hand, ink, and its foliation reads 31 [expected 41].

supportDesc.foliation: Devanāgarī numerals, top-left and bottom-right margin, verso. Not extant on all folios.
Arabic numerals in pencil, bottom-right corner, recto (added by Gambier-Parry, Thomas Thomas Gambier-Parry); this foliation starts with the first flyleaf).

condition.p: F. 147r [f. 23r in original foliation] left blank.
Missing ff. 4-6 and 18-19 [original foliation]. Last folio, f. 165r, is written in a different hand and its original foliation reads 31.

handNote.desc: Devanāgarī in brown ink. Corrections in yellow pigment.

additions.p: Abbreviated marginal title, top left and bottom right margins, verso.
Marginal corrections and interlinear glosses in the same hand.

availability.p: Entry to read in the Library is permitted only on presentation of a valid reader's card, for admissions procedures contact Bodleian Libraries' Admissions Office.

msContents.summary: A previously uncatalogued complete paper manuscript of Bhartṛhari's Śṛṅgāraśataka, a part of the Śatakatraya, with a commentary.

msItem.title: Śṛṅgāraśataka
msItem.rubric: F. 167v [f. 1v in original foliation]: || oṃ || śrīgaṇeśāya namaḥ || || atha śṛṃgāraśatakaṃ ||
msItem.incipit: F. 167v [f. 1v in original foliation]: || || śaṃbhuḥ svataṃbhuharayo hariṇekṣaṇānāṃ yenakriyaṃta satataṃ gṛhakarmadāsāḥ

msItem.title: An unidentified commentary to the Śṛṅgāraśataka
msItem.colophon: Ff. 196r [f. 30r in original foliation]: idaṃ śṛṃgāraśata[ka]ṃ bhartṛhatiṇā kṛtaṁ tat kāmavudhyānakṛṃtaṃā[?]āveva āraṃbhesamastabhāvauḥ khalu vaṃdhanaṃ striya ity uktaṃ madhyati duḥkhai kahetur mahikaścid asti ity ādīni vacanāni sthalesthitāni nāsāṁ kāminīnāṃ praśaṃsākām abhitrīyanesālikatāprāte sarvaṃ vivekadṛṣṭvā ninditam iti śrī bhartṛhariṇā viravina śṛṃgāraśatakaṃ samāptaṃ || cha || cha

supportDesc.foliation: Devanāgarī numerals, top-left and bottom-right margin, verso. Not extant on all folios.
Arabic numerals in pencil, bottom-right corner, recto (added by Gambier-Parry, Thomas Thomas Gambier-Parry); this foliation starts with the first flyleaf).

layout.note: Commentary layout: tripāṭha; mūla cited in full.

handNote.desc: Devanāgarī in black ink. Highlighted in red ink. Vertical margins lined in red ink.

additions.p: Abbreviated marginal title, top left and bottom right margins, verso.
Marginal corrections and interlinear glosses in a different hand.

availability.p: Entry to read in the Library is permitted only on presentation of a valid reader's card, for admissions procedures contact Bodleian Libraries' Admissions Office.

msContents.summary: A previously uncatalogued incomplete paper manuscript of the Rāmacarita. On the recto of the first folio, it includes an inidentified passage and diagrams in a different hand, written in a Bengali script.

msItem.title: An unidentified passage and diagrams, written in Bengali script
Rāmacarita
msItem.rubric: F. 198v [f. 1v in original foliation]: śrī gaṇeśāya namaḥ ||
msItem.incipit: F. 198v [f. 1v in original foliation] praṇiyanta girāṃ devī manugamya mahākaviṃ | vaśtiṃ vatarām[sya] katha pāsi samāsataḥ || api rāmasya caritaṃ tad yaṃ vaktum ichati | titīrṣur iva saṃsārasāgaraṃ duṣkṛtī janaḥ ||

supportDesc.foliation: Devanāgarī numerals, mid-left and mid-right margin, verso.
Arabic numerals in pencil, bottom-right corner, recto (added by Gambier-Parry, Thomas Thomas Gambier-Parry); this foliation starts with the first flyleaf).

additions.p: Marginal corrections in a different hand.

availability.p: Entry to read in the Library is permitted only on presentation of a valid reader's card, for admissions procedures contact Bodleian Libraries' Admissions Office.

msContents.summary: A previously uncatalogued incomplete paper manuscript of three anonymous subhāṣita poems, the Pañcaratna, Ṣaḍratna, and the Navaratna.

msItem.title: Pañcaratna
msItem.rubric: F. 216v [f. 1v in original foliation]: śrī gaṇeśāya namaḥ
msItem.incipit: F. 216v [f. 1v in original foliation] pañcaratnaṃ nāgaḥ potas tathā vaighaṃ kṣāntiḥ śākyaṃ yathā kramaṃ pañcaratnam idaṃ proktaṃ vidṛṣāmapi durlabhaṃ ||

msItem.title: Ṣaḍratna
msItem.rubric: F. 217v [f. 1v in original foliation]: śrī gaṇeśāya namaḥ
msItem.incipit: F. 217v [f. 1v in original foliation]: śāstraṃ korthaṃs tathā mūrkhe dānaṃ durmantriṇāṃ tathā lobhopya stī[ti]vijayaṃ kramāt ṣaḍratnamīritaṃ

msItem.title: Navaratna
msItem.incipit: F. 218r [f. 2r in original foliation]: arthī lāghavamucchito nipatanaṃ kāmāturo lāñchanaṃ
msItem.colophon: F. 219v [f. 3v in original foliation]: iti śrī navaratnaṃ samāptaṃ || @@@||

supportDesc.support:
Paper.
F. 216 and 219 are written on thick, yellow paper.
9 26
supportDesc.foliation: Devanāgarī numerals, top-left and bottom-right margin, verso.
Arabic numerals in pencil, bottom-right corner, recto (added by Gambier-Parry, Thomas Thomas Gambier-Parry); this foliation starts with the first flyleaf).

condition.p: Missing leaves. The Pañcaratna is missing three verses. The Ṣaḍratna is missing 4 verses, and the Navaratna is missing f. 1 with the first verse.

additions.p: Abbreviated marginal title, top left and bottom right margins, verso.

availability.p: Entry to read in the Library is permitted only on presentation of a valid reader's card, for admissions procedures contact Bodleian Libraries' Admissions Office.

category.catDesc: General teaching on ethics and particular ethical topics
Narrative literature relating to the Jinas, early Jain teachers, and individual characters
